name: Machine Parts Factory
description: Produces machine parts from stone. Three stone is needed to make one machine part.

upgrades.name: Scrap Metal Recycling
upgrades.description: Two stone is now used to make a machine part instead of three.

modes.name: Turbo Boost
modes.description: The factory will work twice as fast, but also use two more stone per machine part.

modes.name: Disable Factory
modes.description: The factory will fully halt production and not use any stone.
